origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicDataAPI.fetch_data', 'description': 'This function fetches economic data based on the data type and time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'data_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of economic data, e.g., financial_innovation_cases, economic_growth_indicators.'}, {'name': 'time_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for the data, e.g., last_5_years, current_year.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'The requested economic data.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicDataAPI.fetch_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'data_type'是'financial_innovation_cases', 'time_period'是'last_5_years'.
